Reviews.Title: very unhappy with product and seller
Reviews.Author: jeff
Reviews.Content: Right out of the box one of the cameras didn't work. The other camera's would not work if they were in direct sunlight because of the infra red light from the sun so i could not put any camera near a window or door. You also cannot mount the cameras in any other position that flat because the housing cannot rotate or turn. If you try and mount them on a wall or ceiling your images will record upside down or sideways.I emailed the seller 3X about this to see about returning it and in 4 days they could not bother to respond. I had to file an A2Z claim with Amazon and then they finally responded after about two weeks. After returning the product it still took another 2 weeks to get a credit. I never did get refunded for shipping like i was told i would either, Just the price of the crappy camera system. I was very disappointed all the way around.

Reviews.Title: Wrong Product
Reviews.Author: Camera
Reviews.Content: I ordered a wireless security camera, but when the product arrived it was not wireless.  There was no contact information to reach the original company except a number in China or Hong Kong.
